name: checka11y-css
description: A CSS stylesheet to quickly highlight a11y concerns.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build:expanded && npm run build:errors:expanded && npm run build:warnings:expanded
scripts.build:expanded: node-sass src/checka11y.scss ./checka11y.css --output-style compressed && node-sass ./checka11y.css ./checka11y.css --output-style expanded && npx postcss checka11y.css --use autoprefixer --replace --no-map
scripts.build:errors:expanded: node-sass src/errors/checka11y-errors.scss ./checka11y-errors.css --output-style compressed && node-sass ./checka11y-errors.css ./checka11y-errors.css --output-style expanded && npx postcss checka11y-errors.css --use autoprefixer --replace --no-map
scripts.build:warnings:expanded: node-sass src/warnings/checka11y-warnings.scss ./checka11y-warnings.css --output-style compressed && node-sass ./checka11y-warnings.css ./checka11y-warnings.css --output-style expanded && npx postcss checka11y-warnings.css --use autoprefixer --replace --no-map
